accum = sc.accumulator(0) 
rdd = sc.parallelize([1, 2, 3, 4]) 

def f(x): 
    global accum
    accum += x  
 
rdd.foreach(f)

%pyspark 
rdd = sc.textFile('/tmp/u.data')

%pyspark
def parseLine(line):
    fields = line.split(',')
    stationID = fields[0]
    entryType = fields[2]
    temperature = float(fields[3]) * 0.1 * (9.0 / 5.0) + 32.0
    return (stationID, entryType, temperature)
    
lines = sc.textFile("file:///tmp/1800.csv")
parsedLines = lines.map(parseLine)
parsedLines.take(3)

%pyspark
minTemps = parsedLines.filter(lambda x: "TMIN" in x[1])
stationTemps = minTemps.map(lambda x: (x[0], x[2]))
stationTemps.take(3)

%pyspark
minTemps = stationTemps.reduceByKey(lambda x, y: min(x,y))
results = minTemps.collect()
results[0:3]

各位國人同胞，記者朋友，大家早安。

今天，雨下得很大，我希望國人同胞要注意交通安全，我也請蘇院長及行政團隊要做好必要的準備。

今天是我就職滿三年，我有一些感想，要和各位分享。

前天星期六，台灣第一座離岸風場，終於開始施工了。風機葉片現在就在台中港，等待運送到海上組裝。一切順利的話，我們在今年底就會完成這座風場，將會創下一個重要的里程碑。

再生能源的夢想，台灣談了十幾年。從我上任之後，三年來經過修法、簽約、議價、開工，才終於要實現。

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
import jieba
input = sc.textFile('/tmp/speech.txt')
words = input.flatMap(lambda e: list(jieba.cut(e)) )
words = words.filter(lambda x: len(x) > 1)
wordCounts = words.countByValue()
swd = sorted(wordCounts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
swd[0:30]

%pyspark
def parseLine(line):
    fields = line.split(',')
    age = int(fields[2])
    numFriends = int(fields[3])
    return (age, numFriends)

lines = sc.textFile("file:///tmp/fakefriends.csv")
rdd = lines.map(parseLine)
rdd.take(3)

%pyspark
totalsByAge = rdd2.reduceByKey(lambda x, y: (x[0] + y[0], x[1] + y[1]))
rdd3.take(3)

%pyspark
averagesByAge = totalsByAge.mapValues(lambda x: x[0] / x[1])
results = averagesByAge.collect()
results[0:3]

%pyspark
def extractCustomerPricePairs(line):
    fields = line.split(',')
    return (int(fields[0]), float(fields[2]))
input = sc.textFile("file:///tmp/customer-orders.csv")
mappedInput = input.map(extractCustomerPricePairs)
mappedInput.take(3)

totalByCustomer = mappedInput.reduceByKey(lambda x, y: x + y)

results = totalByCustomer.take(3)
results

%pyspark
header = raw_data.first()
skip_data = raw_data.filter(lambda line: line != header)
skip_data.take(3)

%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import Row

csv_data = skip_data.map(lambda l: l.split("::"))
print(csv_data.take(3))

row_data = csv_data.map(lambda p: Row(
    userid=p[0], 
    itemid=p[1],
    rating=int(p[2])
    )
)
print(row_data.take(3))

%pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
sqlContext = SQLContext(sc)

df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(row_data)

%pyspark
ratings_data = sqlContext.sql("""
    SELECT itemid,avg(rating) as avg_rating from ratings group by itemid order by avg_rating desc limit 3
""")
ratings_data.show()

movies = sc.textFile('/tmp/u.item')
movies_data = movies.map(lambda l:l.split('|'))

    Row(movieid=p[0], moviename=p[1] )
)

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
ratings = sc.textFile('file:/tmp/u.data', 4)
ratings_data = ratings.map(lambda l:l.split())
ratings_row_data = ratings_data.map(lambda p: 
    Row( userid=p[0], movieid=p[1], rating=int(p[2]) )
)
ratings_row_data.take(4)

df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(ratings_row_data)
df.registerTempTable("ratings")

ratings_df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(ratings_row_data)
ratings_df.registerTempTable("ratings")

%pyspark
best_movies = sqlContext.sql("""
     SELECT moviename,avg(rating) as avg_rating, count(1) as cnt  from movies inner join ratings on ratings.movieid = movies.movieid group by moviename order by  avg(rating) desc limit 10
""")
best_movies.show(5)
